entry.title: Reference Count Style Memory Management of Apple
entry.content:
• A variable hold the objects generate by itself id obj = [[NSObject alloc] init];
  • A variable can hold the objects generate by other variables id obj = [NSMutableArray array]; [obj retain];

  • If the objects of a variable are no longer needed, the variable can release the objects held by itself

  • Generate by itself and hold the objects by itself id obj = [[NSObject alloc] init]; [obj release];

  • Generate by others and hold the objects by itself id obj = [NSMutableArray array]; [obj retain]; [obj release];
  • A variable cannot release the objects held by others id obj1 = [obj0 object]; [obj1 release]; // error
